DOC.brief_summary: This randomize , double blind , placebo control , 2 arm , parallel group , methodology study assess effect 6 week liraglutide administration food intake obese subject .
DOC.brief_title: Methodology Study To Examine 6-Week Food Intake With Liraglutide In Obese Subjects
DOC.criteria: Males female subject ; Body Mass Index 3040 kg/m2 ; Evidence history clinically significant hematological , renal , endocrine , pulmonary , gastrointestinal , cardiovascular , hepatic , psychiatric , neurologic , allergic disease ( include drug allergises , exclude untreated , asymptomatic , seasonal allergy time dose )
